text: Yokohama Flügels is a former football club which has played in Japan. == Name == *1964-1992 All Nippon Airways SC *1992-1998 Yokohama Flügels == League title == *Japan Soccer League Division 2 : 1 **1987/88 == League position == *1984 : JSL Division 2 - 2nd *1985/86 : JSL Division 1 - 12th *1986/87 : JSL Division 2 - 11th *1987/88 : JSL Division 2 - 1st *1988/89 : JSL Division 1 - 2nd *1989/90 : JSL Division 1 - 3rd *1990/91 : JSL Division 1 - 7th *1991/92 : JSL Division 1 - 8th *1993 : J1 League - 6th *1994 : J1 League - 7th *1995 : J1 League - 13th *1996 : J1 League - 3rd *1997 : J1 League - 6th *1998 : J1 League - 7th == References == Category:Football clubs in Yokohama
title: Yokohama Flügels
